title: Artist Feature: Amelie Niederbuchner

[](http://thecurlyhead.blogspot.com/)

[**Amelie Niederbuchner**](http://thecurlyhead.blogspot.com/) does a remarkable thing with her photography; she manages to capture the bliss of the image itself and the joy of actually taking the photo. She makes no reservations about this, taking photos of friends hanging by a lake or taking a trip on a boat. The colours are lush and ripe, reveling in the surroundings. Luckily there are depths to her work; some are unnerving in their picturesque qualities, creating a blissful landscape of naivety that lingers long after the image is gone. One to look out for.

Check out Amelie Niederbuchner’s [Flickr](http://www.flickr.com/people/amelie-n/)
